## Properties

| Property     | Attribute     | Description | Type                            | Default                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| ------------ | ------------- | ----------- | ------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| `align`      | `align`       | 选项内容对齐方向    | `"center" \| "left" \| "right"` | `'center'`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| `defaultKey` | `default-key` | 默认选中项目的key值 | `number`                        | `undefined`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
| `items`      | --            | 选项内容列表      | `any[]`                         | `[{       key: 1,       label: '选项1'     },     {       key: 2,       label: '选项2'     },     {       key: 3,       label: '选项3'     },     {       key: 4,       label: '选项4'     },     {       key: 5,       label: '选项5'     },     {       key: 6,       label: '选项6'     },     {       key: 7,       label: '选项7'     },     {       key: 8,       label: '选项8'     },     {       key: 9,       label: '选项9'     }   ]` |


## Methods

### `getCurrentItem() => Promise<any>`

获取当前选中的选项的数据

#### Returns

Type: `Promise<any>`
